author: travelandtourworld.com
title: SWISS appoints Meike Fuhlrott to its Media Relations teamTravelandtourworld.com
text:
SWISS appoints Meike Fuhlrott to its Media Relations team Published on : Saturday, August 8, 2015
Meike Fuhlrott comes to SWISS from A.T. Kearney. She spent seven years with the management consultancy, most recently as Marketing & Communications Manager for its Zurich operation with responsibility for all Swiss marketing and communications activities. She also held further communications positions (including media spokeswoman roles) for various reputed companies and a PR agency between 2000 and 2008.
“I am delighted we have secured the services of such a seasoned communicator,” says Daniel Bärlocher, Head of SWISS Corporate Communications. “Meike brings extensive experience to her new post, not only as a media spokesperson but also in the PR field.”
Meike Fuhlrott is bilingual (in German and French), having grown up in Geneva. She also holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in Business Administration from the University of Northumbria in Newcastle, UK. She joins Karin Müller, Sonja Ptassek and Stefan Vasic in Daniel Bärlocher’s Media Relations team.
Swiss International Air Lines (SWISS) is Switzerland’s national airline, serving 106 destinations in 49 countries from Zurich and Geneva and carrying over 16 million passengers a year with its 95-aircraft fleet. The company’s Swiss WorldCargo division provides a comprehensive range of airport-to-airport airfreight services for high-value and care-intensive consignments to some 130 destinations in over 80 countries. As ‘The Airline of Switzerland’, SWISS embodies the country’s traditional values, and is committed to delivering the highest product and service quality. With its workforce of some 8,250 personnel, SWISS generated total operating income of CHF 5.2 billion in 2014. SWISS is part of the Lufthansa Group, and is also a member of Star Alliance, the world’s biggest airline network.
Source:- SWISS
